properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. VESSEL, FOUR PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND
   ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE IN
   25-43.77S 048-21.83W ON 09 FEB.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO ANY COASTAL RADIO STATION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 464/20.
